section.p: This encounterParticipant is the attending physician and is usually different from the Physician Reading Study Performer defined in documentationOf/serviceEvent.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-16072, CONF:1098-16073, CONF:1098-32586 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.2"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Physicianof Record Participant template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.2)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:1098-8886)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8888, R2.0=CONF:1098-8888)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8887, R2.0=CONF:1098-8887)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] assignedPerson such that it (CONF:1098-30928)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:1098-30929)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization such that it (CONF:1098-16074)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] name (CONF:1098-16075)
The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id such that @root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:1098-31203)
SHALL conform to Physicianof Record Participant template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.2)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:1098-8886)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8888, R2.0=CONF:1098-8888)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8887, R2.0=CONF:1098-8887)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] assignedPerson such that it (CONF:1098-30928)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:1098-30929)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization such that it (CONF:1098-16074)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] name (CONF:1098-16075)
The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id such that @root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:1098-31203)

body.codeblock: <encounterparticipant xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" typeCode="ATND"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.2" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.2"/> <assignedEntity> <id root="MDHT" extension="2039619178"/> <code code="855222250"/> <assignedPerson> <name/> </assignedPerson> <representedOrganization> <name/> </representedOrganization> </assignedEntity> </encounterparticipant>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8440 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.2"
SHALL conform to CDA Encounter Participant
Consol Physicianof Record Participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="ATND" (CONF:8881, R2.0=CONF:1098-8881)
Consol Physicianof Record Participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity, where its type is Assigned Entity (CONF:8886)

Consol Assigned Entity SHALL contain a valid DICOM Organizational Role from DICOM CID 7452 (Value Set 1.2.840.10008.6.1.516)(@codeSystem is 1.2.840.10008.2.16.4) or an appropriate national health care provider coding system (e.g., NUCC in the U.S., where @codeSystem is 2.16.840.1.113883.6.101) (CONF:8889, R2.0=CONF:1098-8889)
Consol Assigned Entity The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id where id/@root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:10034)
SHALL conform to CDA Assigned Entity
Consol Assigned Entity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8888, R2.0=CONF:1098-8888)
Consol Assigned Entity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8887, R2.0=CONF:1098-8887)
Consol Assigned Entity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] assignedPerson, where its type is Assigned Person
Consol Assigned Person SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] name (CONF:8890)
